chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
P: Set
m: nat
p: dio_polynomial nat P

Goal:
(forall x : nat, In x (dp_var_list p) -> x < m) -> {q : dio_polynomial (pos m) P | forall (φ : nat -> nat) (ν : P -> nat), dp_eval φ ν p = dp_eval (vec_pos (fun2vec 0 m φ)) ν q}

Premises:
vec_pos : forall (X : Type) (n : nat), vec X n -> pos n -> X
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive dio_polynomial (V P : Set) : Set := dp_nat : nat -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_var : V -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_par : P -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_comp : dio_op -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P Arguments dio_polynomial (_ _)%type_scope Arguments dp_nat {V P}%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments dp_var {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_par {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_comp {V P}%type_scope
dp_eval : forall V P : Set, (V -> nat) -> (P -> nat) -> dio_polynomial V P -> nat
fun2vec : forall X : Type, nat -> forall n : nat, (nat -> X) -> vec X n
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
dp_var_list : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P -> list V
dp_eval_fix_mul : forall (V P : Set) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (p q : dio_polynomial V P), dp_eval φ ν (dp_mul p q) = dp_eval φ ν p * dp_eval φ ν q
dp_eval_fix_add : forall (V P : Set) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (p q : dio_polynomial V P), dp_eval φ ν (dp_add p q) = dp_eval φ ν p + dp_eval φ ν q
dp_eval_ext : forall (V P : Set) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (φ' : V -> nat) (ν' : P -> nat) (p : dio_polynomial V P), (forall v : V, In v (dp_var_list p) -> φ v = φ' v) -> (forall i : P, In i (dp_par_list p) -> ν i = ν' i) -> dp_eval φ ν p = dp_eval φ' ν' p
dio_elem_single : forall l : list dio_constraint, {E : dio_single nat nat | dio_single_size E <= 2 + 20 * length l /\ (forall ν φ : nat -> nat, dp_eval φ ν (fst E) = dp_eval φ ν (snd E) <-> Forall (dc_eval φ ν) l)}
Build_dio_repr_at : forall (R : (nat -> nat) -> Prop) (a n l : nat) (ds_eqns : list dio_constraint) (ds_ref : nat), length ds_eqns = l -> (forall (x : nat) (c : dio_constraint), In c ds_eqns -> dc_vars c x -> a <= x < a + n) -> a <= ds_ref < a + n -> (forall ν : nat -> nat, exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) ds_eqns) -> (forall ν : nat -> nat, R ν <-> (exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) ds_eqns /\ φ ds_ref = 0)) -> dio_repr_at R a n l
dio_formula_elem : forall f : dio_formula, {l : list dio_constraint | length l <= 1 + 7 * df_size f /\ (forall (c : dio_constraint) (x : nat), In c l -> dc_vars c x -> x < 8 * df_size f) /\ (forall ν : nat -> nat, df_pred f ν <-> (exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) l))}
Inductive dio_polynomial (V P : Set) : Set := dp_nat : nat -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_var : V -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_par : P -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_comp : dio_op -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P Arguments dio_polynomial (_ _)%type_scope Arguments dp_nat {V P}%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments dp_var {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_par {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_comp {V P}%type_scope
Record dio_repr_at (R : (nat -> nat) -> Prop) (a n l : nat) : Set := Build_dio_repr_at { ds_eqns : list dio_constraint; ds_ref : nat; ds_H0 : length ds_eqns = l; ds_H1 : forall (x : nat) (c : dio_constraint), In c ds_eqns -> dc_vars c x -> a <= x < a + n; ds_H2 : a <= ds_ref < a + n; ds_H3 : forall ν : nat -> nat, exists φ : nat ->...-> (exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) ds_eqns /\ φ ds_ref = 0) } Arguments dio_repr_at _%function_scope (_ _ _)%nat_scope Arguments Build_dio_repr_at _%function_scope [a]%nat_scope _%nat_scope [l]%nat_scope [ds_eqns]%list_scope [ds_ref]%nat_scope _ _%function_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope
df_pred = fix df_pred (f : dio_formula) (ν : nat -> nat) {struct f} : Prop := match f with | df_cst x n => ν x = n | df_eq x y => ν x = ν y | df_op o x y z => ν x = de_op_sem o (ν y) (ν z) | df_bin o f0 g => df_op_sem o (df_pred f0 ν) (df_pred g ν) | ∃ f0 => exists n : nat, df_pred f0 n·ν end : dio_formula -> (nat -> nat) -> Prop Arguments df_pred _ _%function_scope
dc_eval = fun (φ ν : nat -> nat) (c : dio_constraint) => φ (fst c) = dee_eval φ ν (snd c) : (nat -> nat) -> (nat -> nat) -> dio_constraint -> Prop Arguments dc_eval (_ _)%function_scope
vec2fun_fun2vec : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X) (x : X) (i : nat), i < n -> vec2fun (fun2vec 0 n f) x i = f i
dio_polynomial_sind : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> SProp), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
dio_polynomial_rec : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> Set), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
dio_polynomial_rect : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> Type), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
dio_polynomial_ind : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
list_upper_bound : forall l : list nat, {m : nat | forall x : nat, In x l -> x < m}
dio_single_pred : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P * dio_polynomial V P -> (P -> nat) -> Prop
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
Forall_impl : forall (X : Type) (P Q : X -> Prop) (ll : list X), (forall x : X, In x ll -> P x -> Q x) -> Forall P ll -> Forall Q ll
valuation_one_union : forall (k v : nat) (i1 : interval) (g1 : nat -> nat) (i2 : interval) (g2 : nat -> nat), ~ in_interval (interval_union i1 i2) k -> interval_disjoint i1 i2 -> {g : nat -> nat | g k = v /\ (forall x : nat, in_interval i1 x -> g x = g1 x) /\ (forall x : nat, in_interval i2 x -> g x = g2 x)}
dio_elem_equation : forall l : list dio_constraint, {E : dio_single nat nat | dio_single_size E <= 2 + 20 * length l /\ (forall ν : nat -> nat, dio_single_pred E ν <-> (exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) l))}
dp_size : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P -> nat
dee_eval = fun (φ ν : nat -> nat) (e : dio_elem_expr) => match e with | dee_nat n => n | dee_var v => φ v | dee_par i => ν i | dee_comp o v w => de_op_sem o (φ v) (φ w) end : (nat -> nat) -> (nat -> nat) -> dio_elem_expr -> nat Arguments dee_eval (_ _)%function_scope
pos_S_inv : forall p0 : pos (S ?n), (p0 = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p0 = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [P : Set m : nat p : dio_polynomial nat P |- nat]
Forall_forall : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall P l < -> (forall x : A, In x l -> P x)
list_dec : forall (X : Type) (P Q : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {P x} + {Q x}) -> forall l : list X, {x : X | In x l /\ P x} + {forall x : X, In x l -> Q x}
dc_eval_ext : forall (c : dio_constraint) (φ1 ν1 φ2 ν2 : nat -> nat), (forall x : nat, dc_vars c x -> φ1 x = φ2 x) -> (forall x : nat, ν1 x = ν2 x) -> dc_eval φ1 ν1 c < -> dc_eval φ2 ν2 c
map_vec_pos_equiv : forall (X : Type) (R : X -> X -> Prop) (Y : Type) (T : Y -> Y -> Prop), (forall y : Y, T y y) -> (forall x y z : Y, T x y -> T y z -> T x z) -> forall (n : nat) (f : vec X n -> Y), (forall (p : pos n) (v : vec X n) (x y : X), R x y -> T (f (vec_change v p x)) (f (vec_change v p y))) -> forall v w : vec X n, (forall p : pos n, R (vec_pos v p) (vec_pos w p)) -> T (f v) (f w)
dio_single = fun V P : Set => (dio_polynomial V P * dio_polynomial V P)%type : Set -> Set -> Set Arguments dio_single (_ _)%type_scope
Forall_forall_map : forall (X : Type) (f : nat -> X) (n : nat) (l : list X) (P : X -> Prop), l = map f (list_an 0 n) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> P (f i)) < -> Forall P l
